definition: to commit suicide by cutting one's own throat

sentences.english: "Suicided beside Wu River"to accomplish his arrogant unyielding personality.
sentences.chinese: “自刎烏江”造就了他高傲不屈的人格。

definition: to demonstrate one's sincerity by dying
to sacrifice one's life by loyalty (to one's prince, one's husband etc)
to extend one's neck in preparation for execution (idiom)
to commit suicide on the orders of a sovereign (old)
Xiang Yu the Conqueror (232-202 BC), warlord defeated by first Han emperor
to vow to fight to the death
to die together in the name of love/to sacrifice oneself for love
(idiom) to be unable to return to one's hometown due to the shame of failure (originally referred to Xiang Yu 項羽|项羽[Xiang4 Yu3], who chose not to retreat to Jiangdong after his humiliating defeat)
pinyin: wu2 yan2 jian4 Jiang1 dong1 fu4 lao3
